mapper.insert: insert into payment( payment_no, payment_owner, payment_tid, payment_name, payment_total, payment_remain, reservation_id ) values( #{paymentNo}, #{paymentOwner}, #{paymentTid}, #{paymentName}, #{paymentTotal}, #{paymentRemain}, #{reservationId} )
mapper.select: select * from payment where payment_owner = #{loginId} order by payment_no desc
